title: Service Learning-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Internship

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theory and understanding of the ADDIE model
context.additional_context: Development and evaluation of practical mathematics educational materials through collaboration with educational technology clients

learning_goals: The mathematics instructional design process can be completed by utilizing the ADDIE model and the MOKR framework
Digital learning materials reflecting the actual requirements of mathematics educational institutions can be developed
Instructional design expertise can be enhanced through collaborative projects based on service-learning principles

resources: Digital Tools for Mathematics Education (e.g., GeoGebra)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
